short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Swap words around on the web

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WordSwapper is a fun tool for swapping words on the web.

You can choose in the popup which words should be swapped with which other words. For example you can say 'Cookie' should be swapped with 'Biscuit'.

You can also specify websites you do not want swaps to occur on. For example, you might not want swaps to occur on emails.
